title: The 2014 Movie Draft: CR's Revenge
description:
It's time once again for a Movie Draft. Chris Ryan returns with hopes of staving off Sean and Amanda to claim his first draft victory (15:00). Then, Sean is joined by Clea DuVall, an actress you may know from films like 'But I’m a Cheerleader,' 'Zodiac,' and 'Argo.' They talk about DuVall’s second film as a director, 'Happiest Season'—a charming holiday rom-com about a couple played by Kristen Stewart and Mackenzie Davis—that hits Hulu on Wednesday (59:47).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Chris Ryan and Clea DuVall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
